actions.name: Orichalcum Pulse

cost.trigger: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in.
Effect: The weather is changed to Sunny and remains while the user is active on the field. Additionally, the user's ATK increases by 33% while Sunny Weather is active. If the user uses Collision Course while in Sunny Weather, their SPD stage increases by +1 for 5 activations. If the user Faints or is switched out, the current active Sunny Weather lasts for 3 rounds.
